mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tp_message_read (PERSON_ID, READ_TIME, MSG_ID, MSG_TITLE, MSG_TYPE, MSG_SCOPE, MSG_GROUP, MSG_FROM, MSG_FROM_NAME, MSG_TO, MSG_TO_NAME, LEVELCODE, MSG_CONTEXT, ACTIVED, EXTEND01, EXTEND02, EXTEND03, CREATE_TIME) VALUES (#{personId}, #{readTime}, #{msgId}, #{msgTitle}, #{msgType}, #{msgScope}, #{msgGroup}, #{msgFrom}, #{msgFromName}, #{msgTo}, #{msgToName}, #{levelcode}, #{msgContext}, #{actived}, #{extend01}, #{extend02}, #{extend03}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT PERSON_ID, READ_TIME, MSG_ID, MSG_TITLE, MSG_TYPE, MSG_SCOPE, MSG_GROUP, MSG_FROM, MSG_FROM_NAME, MSG_TO, MSG_TO_NAME, LEVELCODE, MSG_CONTEXT, ACTIVED, EXTEND01, EXTEND02, EXTEND03, CREATE_TIME FROM tp_message_read WHERE ACTIVED = 1 and PERSON_ID = #{personId} and MSG_ID = #{msgId}
mapper.update: UPDATE tp_message_read SET ACTIVED = 0 WHERE PERSON_ID = #{personId}
